thread.title: BRIEF-Secoo Q4 Total Net Revenue 574.9 Mln, Increased 44.2 pct

title: BRIEF-Secoo Q4 Total Net Revenue 574.9 Mln, Increased 44.2 pct
text: March 22, 2018 / 1:09 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Secoo Q4 Total Net Revenue 574.9 Mln, Increased 44.2 pct Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 22 (Reuters) - Secoo Holding Ltd: * SECOO REPORTED UNAUDITED Q4 AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULT: TOTAL NET REVENUE 574.9 MILLION, INCREASED BY 44.2% * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE RMB 3.28 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE RMB 1.76 * QTRLY ‍TOTAL NET REVENUES REACHED US$217.0 MILLION, UP 60.5% FROM Q4 2016​ * ‍TOTAL NUMBER OF ORDERS WAS 549.4 THOUSAND FOR Q4 2017, REPRESENTING AN INCREASE OF 57.6% FROM 348.7 THOUSAND FOR Q4 2016​ * ‍NUMBER OF ACTIVE CUSTOMERS INCREASED BY 66.3% TO 0.2 MILLION FOR Q4 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
